category.name: Manufacturing
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: Mci0ShowOrHideAssemblyPMI
preference.preference_description: Specifies if the configuration rules needs to be applied to the assembly Product Manufacturing Information (PMI). Assembly PMI lines are connected to its sub assembly parts with iman relation. So the PMI lines should configure according to configuration of the connected items. Valid Values: * "true": Assmebly PMIs should also be configured out if connected part is configued out. This is the default value. * "false": There should not be any impact of connected part configuration on the PMI line configuration. Assembly PMIs should always be showned.
